executable.title: Spherical Harmonic coefficients To Spherical Function Samples
executable.description: conversion from SH coefficients to spherical function samples.

image.name: _InputSHFile
image.description: Input image file where each voxel contains a vector of SH coefficients.

image.name: _OutputFile
image.description: Output image file where each voxel contains a vector of spherical function samples.

file.name: _dataOrientationsFile
file.label: Data Orientations File
file.description: Text file that contains the gradient orientations of the data
